english.segment1: Wonderful is what I perceived, This life would be, pain and problem free, But over time, I found reality. And through it all I see, That You're the Only One who gets me
english.segment2: Chorus: I may be misunderstoood 'cause I wouldn't ever fake it. You're the Only One who understands my pain. You get me, You get me. It doesn't matter what they do, what they think, what they say, At the end of the day, I'm okay anyway. 'Cause Lord, You get me.
english.segment3: No more tears; it's a silent night. You've broken down all fear, 'Cause You invaded all of me. You know me better than I know myself. The key to my security. There is no one else who gets me.
